trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Krenko can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Krenko makes two attacks with his scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage..

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature Krenko can see targets him with an attack, Krenko chooses another goblin within 5 feet of him. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
